connect module¶

connect.get_data(url)¶
connect.parse_html(target, data, depth)¶

Method to parse an html for links and forms

Parameters:
  • target (string url) – Target URL to set the scope for parsing
  • data (string html data) – HTML data to parse
  • depth – Within the scope, depth limits how many extra paths can be taken
Returns:

links dict with structure {url : depth}
Return type:

string, int
connect.scrape_links(url, depth)¶
connect.set_target(request)¶

Set attack target. Makes connection to ensure that target is valid.

Args:
request: The target url to connect with
Returns:
A tuple of connection file and a string response. The connfd is file object that contains meta data to be used by the scraper. The string response indicates whether the connection was successful or an exception was caught.
